document_data.name: ''Swimtide Harness''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''swimtide harness''''' was a variety of [[magic item|magical]] [[belt]] that had saved the lives of more than a few sea captains.
document_data.Description: These belts were made of [[oilskin]] and blue in coloration.
document_data.Powers: Those who wore one of these belts found their ability at swimming to be improved, as well as being able to hold their breath for longer.
